title: Toaripi (1902) New Testament
description:
Toaripi, or East Elema, is a Trans-New Guinea language of Papua New Guinea. It is a non-Austronesian language.; 1902 Gospels BFBS, London Translated by J. H. Holmes, London MS.

1914 New Testament; 1928 New Testament (revised) BFBS, London Translated and revised by E. Pryce Jones, LMS.; 1960 New Testament (reprinted) Psalms BFBS, London; 1963 Genesis; 1965 Exodus; 1968 Job BFBS in Australia, Sydney Translated by H. A. Brown, LMS.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Toaripi
language.area: Gulf Province, Cape Possession to Cape Cupola, Kerema a main town.
